thread.title: Garo
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Garo

author: Garo
title: Garo
text:
I received the Frames from American Frames and could not be more satisfied with the QUALITY and LOOK.
Moreover, I have to complement the employees who fabricated & assembled our frames and the employees that prepared the packages for shipping. It was in itself a work of art. My wife and I were in total amazement as to how carefully each piece of packaging material was placed, in order to protect the frames.
I am so happy we decided to go with American Frames, especially when there were so many like companies out there. World Class company and will recommend to everyone.
Thank you American Frames.
